latex:
Which terms must be removed from the sum\\
\[ \frac12 + \frac14 + \frac16 + \frac18 + \frac1{10} + \frac1{12}
\]if the sum of the remaining terms is equal to $ 1$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac14\text{ and }\frac18 \qquad \textbf{(B)}\ \frac14\text{ and }\frac1{12} \qquad \textbf{(C)}\ \frac18\text{ and }\frac1{12} \qquad \textbf{(D)}\ \frac16\text{ and }\frac1{10} \qquad \textbf{(E)}\ \frac18\text{ and }\frac1{10}$
